EmailTemplate.subject: Final Reminder: MSL Rate Increase at Midnight Tonight
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MSL Rate Change Final Reminder
Hello,
As a valued BlueWave Partner, we wanted to remind you of the midnight deadline tonight for customers to take advantage of the 3.99% rate with the Mass Solar Loan.
By midnight tonight, Friday, October 27, 2017, your customer must be pre-qualified and have selected a loan product to continue their application through the BlueWave portal in order to be eligible for the 3.99% rate. A customer can be granted the rate without technical confirmation.
If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact Partner Support at partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com or (888) 817-2703.
Due to high volume, the Partner Support line may be busy, please be assured that our team answers all voicemails promptly.
In an effort to expedite any pre-qualified customers, below is a series of screenshots that guide you through the portal steps for a pre-qualified customer.
Once your screen updates to show the second portion of the application has been sent out, your customer is officially granted the 3.99% MSL rate.
Step 1: Ensure you continue the application for customers designated as "pre-qualified".
Step 2: Select the appropriate loan product for your pre-qualified customer applicant.
Thank you for your support in working with customers through the application process.
- BlueWave Partner Support (888) 817-2703 partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com
